sentence: Your beliefs don't stem from believing your race is superior, or that immigrants or other races are inferior, but 'your racism' is arguable in regards to prejudice, discrimination and antagonism (also part of racism).

meta_info: ::id DF-200-192448-618_9862.10 ::date 2014-03-15T23:27:36 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt For example, if you made an unjust distinction of someone because they are an immigrant, not quite sure if that would make you a fully fledged racist, but it certainly would be discrimination. # ::save-date Mon Oct 16, 2017 ::file DF-200-192448-618_9862_10.txt
sentence: For example, if you made an unjust distinction of someone because they are an immigrant, not quite sure if that would make you a fully fledged racist, but it certainly would be discrimination.
